document.masterDocTitle: The bees of the genus Hylaeus FABRICIUS, 1793 of Turkey, with keys to the subgenera and species (Hymenoptera: Anthophila, Colletidae)

Remarks: Ten provinces can be added here to the range of
H. euryscapus
. The species occurs in all geographical regions, from sea level to 2200 m altitude. The flight period extends from the beginning of May to August with a peak in July. It is moderately recorded in Turkey (16 provinces).

Distribution: Western Palaearctic. In Turkey : Balıkesir , Denizli , Konya , İstanbul , Tekirdağ ( WARNCKE 1972 ); Erzurum ( ÖZBEK 1977 ); Ardahan , Aksaray , Artvin , Çorum , Hakkâri , Kayseri , Muğla , Nevşehir , Niğde , Şanlıurfa .
